markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=6022) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Qi Spells

</column>

---

You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump. You gain the [_wind jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2065) qi spell.
name: Wind Jump
